journal: Biochimica et Biophysica Acta (BBA) - Molecular and Cell Biology of Lipids
title: Retraction notice to “Liver conversion of docosahexaenoic and arachidonic acids from their 18-carbon precursors in rats on a DHA-free but α-LNA-containing n−3 PUFA adequate diet” [Biochim. Biophys. Acta 1811 (2011) 484–489]
